topic.title: Welcome to the new /r/watchpeopledie
topic.body:
Alright, so I guess we could call this the refugee camp. People have been going crazy since reddit banned /r/WatchPeopleDie, so I think this is the right time to introduce ZeroNet to you all.

Unlike conventional websites, ZeroNet runs on top of the BitTorrent network, meaning all of the content is hosted by the users. This also means that censorship of any form is basically impossible.

ZeroNet has actually been running for a while, and in my opinion, it has a very solid foundation on it. There's already a lot of websites here, we just need to get more people on board and rebuild the community.

Here are some resources that I think you all need to see:

- https://www.scribd.com/document/402167226/To-All-WPD-Subscribers-Top-Level-Coments

topic.title: [META] Nested comments working!
topic.body:
Reddit-style nested comments are now fully working! There might still be a few bugs, but those will be ironed out soon.

If you can't see any replies, try updating the site, and reloading/rebuilding the database. All of those options are available by dragging the top-right Zero menu to the left.

topic.title: Two soldiers die when plane falls in the Gran Sabana
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/index.html?view:item+id:1Mz1_1Gps22qdX6tS4hnuEkGqKftT7yAroGfJA9_item_1+type:video

A Cessna 206 plane, initials YV-1801, rushed on Monday at noon in the Gran Sabana, Bolívar state . In the accident died a colonel and a sergeant assigned to the Integral Defense Zone (Zodi) Guiana.

The deceased were confirmed by sources of Civil Protection and were identified as Colonel César Paúl Padrino Bruzual and the sergeant major of third José Silvestre Granja. Colonels Andrés Bermúdez and Carlos Sánchez and Jossan Pérez (pilot) were also reported injured.

The plane belonged to the company Aerotransporte La Montaña and rushed a few miles from the airport of Santa Elena de Uairén , specifically in the Maurak mountain range, presuming that due to lack of fuel.

According to unofficial sources, these military officials led the repression of the Pemón population on February 22 and 23, which left five people dead.

topic.title: Newcomers Please Read This - FAQ and Q&A
topic.body:
**Preface**

Welcome to WPD World! First of all, let me just say that this is not a conventional website. We're hosted on ZeroNet, which is based on the BitTorrent network, which means that **no censorship of content in any form is possible**. However, due to that nature, I will have to warn you that some sites on ZeroNet may contain things that you don't want to see. And so we advise you to only open links from trusted sources. On the top left menu bar we've listed some websites we deem safe.

---

**Frequently Asked Questions**

1. **Why do you like seeing people die? What's wrong with you guys?**

    See [this archived reddit thread](https://www.scribd.com/document/402167226/To-All-WPD-Subscribers-Top-Level-Coments).

2. **How do I login and register?**

    Unlike other websites, ZeroNet uses authentication providers to facilitate logins. Our website accepts [KaffieID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1K3tM7irQqSX4Hx3JvNgkimkQzY6jPtBfz) and [ZeroID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz). You can register your username at either of the two.

    Note for users coming from **wpd.world**:

    > ~~When you register at those providers, you will be given a long string of numbers and letters. That's your masterseed (private key), and you'll need to keep that number safe so that you can login with the same username again in the future.~~
    > Posting, commenting, and voting is currently not working. Please download [ZeroNet](https://zeronet.io) to access this site if you want to add content to it.

    Once you've registered, you can come back here and start posting content!

3. **How do I contribute to the website?**

    See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1P7FMP3qngJxRhJidG2C41faCo6yozj2KJ/?Topic:1552894412_1PCXzTVRKs5Fv2x7DNBc6PWZ8GyK7Rj65j/Our+Mission+Statement+and+How+to+Help+Our+Community).

4. **Reporting illegal content**

    If you see any illicit content being posted, please downvote and click the report button. Optionally [send me a message](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=xynixia) containing the link to the post. Warn other users by commenting on the post.

---

**Links**

- [WPD Chatroom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/154aBSfLwqHSKUzy5YwGUGJSbd1V28cHvP)
- [News](http://news.wpd.world/)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/wpd-world/wpd-world)

If you have any questions, concerns, or issues, feel free to ask in the comments below, or hop on our Discord server. The invite link is at the top left menu bar.

Enjoy your stay!

topic.title: [Death] 2 Dead, 6 Injured when a car plowed into some pedestrians in Odessa, Ukraine
[Death] Old man in wheelchair is stabbed to death on city street
[Death] 2003 The Station nightclub fire - 100 dead and 230 injured

1552740115_14JMe2K9H9F9DwFi2s6tuwiQT66FY.body: I know right? I never expected my niche interest in p2p networking would catch on this quickly!
Yeah you can, just hover to the left of your comment and click the edit icon. There should be a button to delete your comment on the bottom right.

1552857222_1Na9gREVGQsS5XN5XjRXGBf223vsJ.body: Ah I've seen this one. Really heartbreaking to see someone die like that.

1552891359_1N4d19g24kkXu5c2yJu2YpkgFKTWq.body: I think that's just how that website works. Strange. I think we should use IFS instead of that YouTube clone for hosting videos.

1552925271_1NZrmyqh8TuE1swhpBzftF68EF4MJ.body: I don't want to have too many stickys, so I've added the link to the FAQ and Q&A post.
